title: Recession - AD-AS, fiscal and mon policy, ForEx

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Assume that the economy of Flatland is in short-run equilibrium and is experiencing a severe recession with no inflation.

Using a correctly labeled aggregate demand and aggregate supply graph, show each of the following for the economy.

Full-employment output

Current output level

Current price level

The federal government announces a major decrease in spending. Using your graph in part (a), show how the decrease in spending will affect each of the following.

Level of output

Price level

Explain the mechanism by which the decrease in government spending will affect the unemployment rate.

The central bank of Flatland decreases its administered interest rates. Explain how the change in the interest rate will affect output and the price level.

Explain how the change in the interest rate in part (d) will affect each of the following.

International value of Flatland’s currency relative to other currencies

Flatland’s exports

Flatland’s imports
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.
